GenAiPlugin.description: Adjust prices for customer quotations based on specific customer requirements. This topic is selected when a customer needs a tailored price adjustment for their quotation.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the customer requests a price adjustment, use EmployeeCopilot__LabelARecord to apply the necessary label for the adjustment.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only adjust prices based on customer-specific requirements. You aren't able to provide detailed pricing for standard quotations or line items without specific customer requests.
